availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Harvey M. Buckley (Henry County, KY, attorney and Col. 5th & 54th KY Inf)

body.p: Henry County, Kentucky, attorney and soldier. Nicholasville, Kentucky, native. Attorney in Henry County in 1860. Served in 5th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as colonel from October 5, 1861 to January 26, 1863. Served in the 54th Kentucky Volunteer Infantry Regiment (U.S.A.) as colonel from September 30, 1864 to September 1, 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henry County, Town of New Castle, 245.
Roger D. Hunt, Colonels in Blue -- Indiana, Kentucky, and Tennessee: A Civil War Biographical Dictionary (Jefferson, N.C.: McFarland, 2014), 149.
